name: Shade (Playoceratops)
description:
Three months ago, Bjørn made himself a fortune from a magic drink that promised incredible eyesight. After a couple of weeks of dissapointing results, his customers began experiencing light intollerence. As light became hazardous, they were forced to dwell in dark holes.

Controls:

Right mouse button : move

Left mouse button : interact

R : Read letter

E + mouse over addressee: Deliver letter

Up, Down, Left, Right arrow keys : Move between scenes. Pressed when icon appears.

To go down a hole you must stand with your feet on the hole and press arrow down.
